title: How I Built My Website with Quarto + Tailwind
text: In this post, I walk through how I used Quarto, Tailwind CSS, and Font Awesome to build a personal-professional website.

title: How I Built My Website with Quarto + Tailwind
text:
1. Setting Up Quarto
Start by installing Quarto and initializing your website:
```bash quarto create-project mysite ‚Äìtype website cd mysite

title: Graph Learning for Microbiome Research
text:
Can we model microbial interactions as graphs? Absolutely.
In this post, I explore the idea of using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to study microbiome dynamics.

Nodes: microbial taxa
Edges: co-occurrence or correlation
Features: abundance, function, location

Using libraries like torch and igraph, this can reveal community structure and functional roles.

title: Exploring Finnish Cultural Metadata with R and Finna API
text:
The Finna API gives access to rich cultural metadata from Finnish libraries and museums.
Using the finna R package, I queried metadata for:

Books on the microbiome
Music archives
Local history collections

Combining finna::search_finna() with tidyverse tools made it easy to visualize and analyze trends.

title: Building an R API Client for Open Data
text: In this post, I describe how I built a minimal R package to interface with an open data API.

title: Building an R API Client for Open Data
text:
Motivation
Many public APIs lack R bindings. Wrapping them in functions using httr2 and jsonlite makes them accessible for analysis.

title: Building an R API Client for Open Data
text:
Steps

Use usethis::create_package()
Add API wrapper functions
Document with roxygen2
Publish to GitHub and document with pkgdown

This approach is scalable and reproducible.

title: Akewak Jeba
text:
üëã Hello, I‚Äôm Akewak Jeba


A data scientist, open science advocate, and tool builder working at the crossroads of microbiome research and the digital humanities. With a background in computer science and a passion for reproducible science, I design and develop software tools that help uncover meaning from complex data.


üåç What I‚Äôm working on



Project researcher at University of Turku, with the Turku Data Science Group.


Author and maintainer of the finna R package for cultural heritage metadata.


Contributor to the Miaverse microbiome analysis suite.


Worked on the Fennica and OpenMuse projects (bibliographic and music heritage).




üõ†Ô∏è Tools & Technologies


I work with technologies like R, Python, Docker, Flask, Quarto,cloud and HPC tools like CSC‚Äôs Rahti, Allas, AWS and google cloud. Whether modeling microbial networks or building APIs for cultural metadata, I enjoy bridging science, software, and creativity.


Tech Stack: R, Python, SQL, Flask, Quarto, Docker, AWS, Rahti, GitHub Actions


üì¨ Want to learn more?
